main event: Several individuals reported sightings of unidentified flying objects in the sky over Port Washington, New York, on the evening of June 20, 1952. The objects were described as elliptical, metallic, and exhibiting maneuvers such as hovering and rapid acceleration.
interesting points: The objects were described as having a dull grayish-white color,Contrary to typical UFO reports, these objects made no sound,Three reports were attached from Weather Bureau stations regarding similar sightings,The witnesses included mature and responsible individuals with no history of fantasy or undue excitement,Observations noted included the objects making abrupt changes in direction and altitude.
witness description: mature and responsible individuals who reported unusual aerial phenomena
